channel.title: Available CSS classes for use in table visualization?
channel.description:
Does anyone know if / where there is a list of all CSS tags that can be used when injecting into the table results?
For example, bg-danger, bg-warning, bg-success, and p-10 which I am already using.
From my research it appears that Redash is using the Bootstrap CSS framework but I have not been able to find any other classes that work in tables.
Thank you!
